title: Reduce landed cost variance across supplier lanes
description: Publish transparent landed-cost breakdown and automate data ingestion of duties, freight, and insurance. Target variance below 3% and data coverage above 90% of SKUs.
kpis: Data coverage of cost components ≥ 90% of SKUs

title: Accelerate customs clearance and exception handling
description: Define escalation playbooks and reduce average clearance time below 24h through process rigor and audits.

title: Unify cost tools and implement anomaly detection
description: Consolidate calculators into a single authoritative cost calculator and automate anomaly detection for lane cost spikes.
